verses.verse: "How <WH2009> beautiful <WH3303> you are, my darling, <WH7474> How <WH2009> beautiful <WH3303> you are! Your eyes <WH5869> are [like] doves <WH3123> behind <WH4480> <WH1157> your veil; <WH6777> Your hair <WH8181> is like a flock <WH5739> of goats <WH5795> That have descended <WH1570> from Mount <WH2022> Gilead. <WH1568>

"Your teeth <WH8127> are like a flock <WH5739> of [newly] shorn <WH7094> ewes Which <WH7945> have come <WH5927> up from [their] washing, <WH7367> All <WH3605> of which <WH7945> bear <WH8382> twins, <WH8382> And not one <WH369> among them has lost <WH9599> her young. <WH9599>

"Your lips <WH8193> are like a scarlet <WH8144> thread, <WH2339> And your mouth <WH9245> is lovely. <WH5000> Your temples <WH7541> are like a slice <WH6400> of a pomegranate <WH7416> Behind <WH4480> <WH1157> your veil. <WH6777>

"Your neck <WH6677> is like the tower <WH4026> of David <WH1732> Built <WH1129> with rows <WH8530> of stones, <WH8530> On which are hung <WH8518> a thousand <WH505> shields, <WH4043> All <WH3605> the round shields <WH7982> of the mighty <WH1368> men. <WH1368>
"Your two <WH8147> breasts <WH7699> are like two <WH8147> fawns, <WH6082> Twins <WH9639> of a gazelle, <WH6646> Which feed <WH7462> among the lilies. <WH7799>

"Until <WH5704> the cool <WH6315> of the day <WH3117> When the shadows <WH6738> flee <WH5127> away, I will go <WH1980> my way <WH1980> to the mountain <WH2022> of myrrh <WH4753> And to the hill <WH1389> of frankincense. <WH3828>
"You are altogether <WH3605> beautiful, <WH3303> my darling, <WH7474> And there <WH369> is no <WH369> blemish <WH9249> in you.

"[Come <WH935>] with me from Lebanon, <WH3844> [my] bride, <WH3618> May you come with me from Lebanon. <WH3844> Journey <WH7788> down <WH7788> from the summit <WH7218> of Amana, <WH549> From the summit <WH7218> of Senir <WH8149> and Hermon, <WH2768> From the dens <WH4585> of lions, <WH738> From the mountains <WH2022> of leopards. <WH5246>

"You have made my heart <WH3823> beat <WH3823> faster, <WH3823> my sister, <WH269> [my] bride; <WH3618> You have made my heart <WH3823> beat <WH3823> faster <WH3823> with a single <WH259> [glance] of your eyes, <WH5869> With a single <WH259> strand <WH6060> of your necklace. <WH9477>

"How <WH4100> beautiful <WH3302> is your love, <WH1730> my sister, <WH269> [my] bride! <WH3618> How <WH4100> much better <WH2896> is your love <WH1730> than <WH4480> wine, <WH3196> And the fragrance <WH7381> of your oils <WH8081> Than <WH4480> all <WH3605> [kinds] of spices! <WH1314>

"Your lips, <WH8193> [my] bride, <WH3618> drip <WH5197> honey; <WH5317> Honey <WH1706> and milk <WH2461> are under <WH8478> your tongue, <WH3956> And the fragrance <WH7381> of your garments <WH8008> is like the fragrance <WH7381> of Lebanon. <WH3844>
"A garden <WH1588> locked <WH5274> is my sister, <WH269> [my] bride, <WH3618> A rock <WH1530> garden <WH1530> locked, <WH5274> a spring <WH4599> sealed <WH2856> up.
"Your shoots <WH7973> are an orchard <WH6508> of pomegranates <WH7416> With choice <WH4022> fruits, <WH4022> <WH6529> henna <WH9218> with nard <WH5373> plants, <WH5373>

Nard <WH5373> and saffron, <WH3750> calamus <WH7070> and cinnamon, <WH7076> With all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of frankincense, <WH3828> Myrrh <WH4753> and aloes, <WH174> along <WH5973> with all <WH3605> the finest <WH7218> spices. <WH1314>
"[You are] a garden <WH1588> spring, <WH4599> A well <WH875> of fresh <WH2416> water, <WH4325> And streams <WH5140> [flowing] from Lebanon. <WH3844>"

"Awake, <WH5782> O north <WH6828> [wind,] And come, <WH935> [wind of] the south; <WH8486> Make my garden <WH1588> breathe <WH6315> out [fragrance,] Let its spices <WH1314> be wafted <WH5140> abroad. May my beloved <WH1730> come <WH935> into his garden <WH1588> And eat <WH398> its choice <WH4022> fruits! <WH6529>"
